concept.title: PGI 209.571-7 Systems engineering and technical assistance contracts.

conbody.p: Because of the special organizational conflict of interest restrictions that relate to systems engineering and technical assistance contracts, it is more practical to separate systems engineering and technical assistance-type work from design- and development-type work, and not include both types of work in the same task order or other contract vehicle.
